techmeme.title: The FAA approves Amazon's Prime Air program to fly drones beyond a pilot's line of sight, letting Amazon expand its delivery area in College Station, Texas (Lynn Doan/Bloomberg)
SEC filing: Salesforce paid $419M, including $374M in cash, to buy commission management service Spiff in a deal announced in December 2023; Spiff raised $110M (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Instagram expands its Limits tool for teens to let them restrict unwanted interactions and limit comments, messages, story replies, and more to Close Friends (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
After a Cruise car hit and dragged a pedestrian, executives say they're in no rush to get back on the road, as Cruise slows its breakneck development to a crawl (Yiwen Lu/New York Times)
An image showing tents in a camp spelling out "All Eyes on Rafah" hits 44M+ shares on Instagram in 48 hours, likely one of the first viral AI activist images (Kat Tenbarge/NBC News)
